身に覚えの無い: (みにおぼえのない) - having no knowledge (of); knowing nothing about; coming from out of the blue; having no connection with oneself

身の置き場がない: (みのおきばがない) - feeling out of place; feeling that one doesn't belong; feeling at a loss in the situation
身の置き場が無い: (みのおきばがない) - feeling out of place; feeling that one doesn't belong; feeling at a loss in the situation

身の置き所が無い: (みのおきどころがない) - (so ashamed or embarrassed that) one does not know where to put oneself; feeling out of place
身の置き所もない: (みのおきどころもない) - (so ashamed or embarrassed that) one does not know where to put oneself; feeling out of place
